title: Hour 1 – Vincent Goodwill (07-08-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 – Vincent Goodwill (07-08-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Chris Broussard and Jason McIntyre are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they debate Patrick Mahomes’ potential and if he will approach the greatest of all time status like Tom Brady and Michael Jordan. They also discuss DeSean Jackson’s anti-Semitic comments and if the Eagles will cut him or not. NBA insider Vincent Goodwill joins the show to tell the guys if NBA players are cautious about going into the Orlando bubble to finish the 2020 season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
